name: Life Changer
description:
Challenge your friends locally or embark on a journey of personal growth and success with dedication and hard work on this life simulation game. Acquire education and skills, advance your career, make sound financial decisions, and invest in assets like clothing, electronics, vehicles, homes and businesses. Grow your businesses, achieve financial stability, and enhance your overall happiness.

The journey to achieve your dreams starts now! Experience the life you've always imagined!

Features:
  • Choose to play as a single player or multiplayer game with the option to challenge your friends or play against the computer.
  • Dive into the full depth of the game with RPG-inspired gameplay, featuring character growth and exploration.
  • Experience the game in many different ways as you develop the best and most efficient strategy to achieve all of your goals.
  • Invest in a variety of items, each with unique benefits, including clothing, electronics, vehicles, homes and businesses
  • Experience dynamic living costs realism of a life simulation game with an inflation and deflation model.
  • Increase your game happiness with activities like going on a scenic trip, watching a movie, attending a concert, shopping, and fine dining.
  • Advance your education from Middle School to Bachelor's Degree and beyond, eventually completing your doctorate!
  • Advance your career to achieve financial stability and potentially progress from a janitor to a CEO of a large company.
  • Grow your businesses with options like research, marketing, renovations, meeting the community, and expanding your business.
  • Design the life you've always wanted with abundant options and possibilities.

    Official Website: https://lifechangergame.com/
